<h1 align="center">
  To do web app
</h1>

![alt text](/images/Gatsby.gif);

This app its a little gatsby app that allow you , add task check if task is completed, eliminate tasks, and show where do you add this task , this app use React-redux and redux-persist.

![alt text](/images/to-do.gif);
